Dashboard.Name: Jira Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Keep track of your development speed and issue accumulation over time by connecting to this Jira dashboard template.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Tree Map, Grid, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Salesforce Opportunities - Current Month
Dashboard.Description: Stay on top of every opportunity and close more business on time. Keep track of open opportunities and the monthly conversion rate using the pre-built Salesforce opportunities dashboard.

Dashboard.Name: Salesforce Leads Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Track your sales progress and monthly lead creation using the pre-built Salesforce leads dashboard.

Dashboard.Name: Google Analytics (Website Traffic)
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the website traffic using your google analytics data. Gain insights over the user visits, country-wise sessions and the traffic in the last 7 days.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Line Chart, Area Chart, Map, Stacked Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Google Analytics (Page Performance)
Dashboard.Description: Gain in-depth metrics of your page performance such as unique page views, average load time , entrances, exits, redirection and DNS lookup time using the pre-built performance dashboard.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Tree Map, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Zendesk
Dashboard.Description: Analyze you support ticket volumes over time using the ZenDesk Dashboard. Get detailed information about the volume of tickets based on priority, type and satisfaction rate over time.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Pie Chart, Spline Chart, Tree map

Dashboard.Name: MailChimp Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Gain Insights of all your mail data using the MailChimp dashboard. Quickly identify trends within your campaigns and explore how the trends have changed over time.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Tree Map, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: GitHub Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Visualize the activity of your GitHub repository such as number of open and closed issues, commits over time, average closure time and much more.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card,Column Chart, Spline Chart, Area Chart,Spline Chart,Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: GitHub - Pull Request Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard, populated with metrics related to pull requests, is helpful to analyze open pull requests in one or more repositories from different angles using different filters.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Combo Box, Date Picker, Card, Grid, Chart

Dashboard.Name: SendGrid Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Monitor all your email metrics using the SendGrid Dashboard. Explore your key metrics such as Clicks, Opens, Delivery rate and much more over a period.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Tree Map, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Xero Online Accounting Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Xero online accounting dashboard helps business owners, bookkeepers, and accountants keep track of what is happening in their business with metrics such as bank balance, accounts receivable and payable, profit and loss details, executive summary, and expense breakdown.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Tree Map, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Twilio Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Gain Insights from your Twilio data such as your calls and messages over time, amount of messages and calls sent and received and much more.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Tree Map, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: YouTube Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Track your YouTube viewers reach using the pre-built YouTube dashboard. Connect your account and visualize various details such as number views, subscriptions, average view duration over time and much more.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Tree Map, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: ServiceNow - Incident Management
Dashboard.Description: ServiceNow dashboard is used to monitor the incident details over a period and provides accurate information regarding average resolution time for an incident and status of incidents based on category and priority.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Heat Map, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Radial Gauge, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Azure DevOps - Sprint Management
Dashboard.Description: Azure DevOps dashboard is used to analyze task details in the sprint and to track sprint velocity, bug status and its severity, task priority, and status of a task.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Column Chart, Pivot Grid, Pie Chart, Doughnut Chart, Area Chart

Dashboard.Name: Infusionsoft Sales Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Tracks your periodical information regarding contact details, orders, subscriptions, and its revenue progress using pre-built Infusionsoft sales dashboard.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Line, Column, Grid, Area, Doughnut

Dashboard.Name: Infusionsoft Opportunities - Current Month
Dashboard.Description: Analyze your opportunities progress information and its conversion rate based on current month data using the pre-built Infusionsoft opportunities dashboard.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Doughnut, Column, Grid, Spline

Dashboard.Name: FreshBooks Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: FreshBooks dashboard provides a detailed view of your business finances that helps to analyze your revenue and expenses, customer growth, and payment status.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, Card, Line, Column, Bar chart, Column chart, Doughnut
